content: I'll play it on my PC. I've got a pretty decent gaming rig, and I'm looking forward to seeing the game's graphics in all their glory. Speaking of graphics, I've been playing a lot of Overwatch lately, and I'm really impressed with the new hero, Sojourn. Her railgun is so much fun to use, and her abilities are really well-designed. Have you heard anything about the development process behind her creation?
